select a.task_id,a.type_id,b.dict_value as type_name,a.task_no,a.task_title,a.task_content,a.proj_id,c.proj_name,d.unit_name ,e.unit_name as maint_name,a.task_time,a.step_code,f.dict_value as step_name from t_task_main a left join (select * from t_sys_dict where dict_unit='task'and dict_type='type') b on a.type_id=b.dict_code left join t_proj_main c on a.proj_id=c.proj_id left join (select * from t_sys_unit where unit_source='zzd') d on a.unit_id=d.unit_id left join (select * from t_sys_unit where unit_source='wbdw') e on a.maint_id=e.unit_id left join (select * from t_sys_dict where dict_unit='task'and dict_type='step') f on a.step_code=f.dict_code where 1=1
and a.unit_id in (select unit_id from t_sys_unit where unit_name like '%' #{params.unitName} '%')
and a.proj_id in (select proj_id from t_proj_main where proj_name like '%' #{params.projName} '%')
and a.task_title like '%' #{params.taskTitle} '%'
and a.maint_id in (select unit_id from t_sys_unit where unit_source='wbdw' and unit_name like '%' #{params.maintName} '%')
and a.step_code = #{params.stepCode}
order by a.task_time desc
select t.task_id,t.type_id,t.task_no,t.task_title,t.task_content,t.proj_id,t.unit_id,t.maint_id,t.task_time,t.step_code from t_task_main t where t.task_id = #{taskId}

select c.event_id,c.ass_id,c.event_type,c.event_content,c.event_time,c.event_source,c.event_state from t_proj_main a inner join t_ass_basic b on a.proj_id=b.proj_id inner join t_ass_event c on b.ass_id=c.ass_id where c.event_type='告警' and c.event_state='未处理' order by c.event_time desc
